name: Color Night Fever
description:
Multiplayer game for Windows 64bits Unreal Mega gamejam 2018.

THEME: REALITY IS OFTEN INACCURATE

(HOPEFULLY multiplayer works, somewhat I doubt it... My second computer died, I couldn't test it)

Lobby;

Have a host create a session and choose the max duration of the game

Each player selects a color

Gameplay:

Middle mouse button to rotate the camera

Mouse wheel to zoom dezoom

Right click on the floor to move your character

Your can only see the color of the tile your character is on

Your character slowly convert the tile color to its own

Winner is the player that converts 10 tiles or the largest number of tiles at the end of the game
